name: Sundried Tomato Mac & Cheese
preparation: Place chicken in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high 3–4 min.

Remove chicken from steamer; set aside. Place pasta in Multipurpose Steamer. Stir in water. Cover; microwave on high until tender, 7–8 min. Drain pasta; return to steamer. Add milk, seasoning, and butter, if using. Stir until evenly mixed.
Add chicken, tomatoes, and spinach to mac & cheese. Stir to combine.
tips: Go vegetarian—simply blend 1 pkg (300g) soft/silken tofu with mac & cheese.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup mixed greens and 2 tsp Epicure Salad Dressing.

summary: An all-time best-seller, this is the Mac & Cheese you’ve been craving – and that your kids will LOVE to eat!
